item.content:encoded:
Price: $33.99 - $14.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:40:18 UTC – Details)



Fiskars Non-stick Micro-Tip Pruning Snips feature precise blades that cut all the way to the tip for clean, healthy cuts on plants in tight spaces
Non-stick blade coating helps reduce jamming and resin build-up when cutting through sticky plants
Awarded the Arthritis Foundation’s ease of use commendation for a design that’s ideal for those with arthritis or limited hand strength
Fully hardened, precision-ground steel blades stay sharp longer
Easy Action spring gently opens blades after each cut to help reduce hand fatigue
SoftGrip touchpoints enhance comfort and control
Easy-open lock protects blades during transport and storage
Full lifetime warranty

4.5
Price: $33.99 - $14.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:40:18 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,

Product Description

World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

[High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
[Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
[Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
[Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
[Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

Package Include:
3 pruner shears and 1 scissor
1 pruner shear 1 folding saw and 1 scissor
2 pruner shears and 1 scissor
3 bonsai scissors
2 garden loppers and 1 pruner shear

Storage Case:
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Quality : The blades of our shears gardening tools are made of high quality stainless steel that gives good precision and makes it easy to cut through branches. The ergonomic handle design reduces stress on your wrist and fits for small or big hands to ensure maximum cutting comfort and no-slip grip.
Material : The blade of these garden hand tools has been sanded to deter tarnish and rust, it’s all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears for gardening would also help adjust the blades angle too.
Comfort : The handle part of the garden scissors/pruning shears/gardening shears/garden clippers is made of high-purity PP+TPR plastic, making the handgrip very comfortable but also tough and strong.
Gardening Helper : These grass shears/pruning scissors/garden pruners could satisfy the need for planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, and greenhouse pruning.
Customer service : If you have any questions or issues regarding our product, please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours.
Add-ons: We offer a pair of free protection gloves to protect your hands when doing gardening work.

From the brand

Grenebo is a representation of a traditional brand of handcrafted gardening tools. With perfection at heart, Grenebo is committed to making the beauty of gardening accessible to all

We have been working with vendors from around the world to bring you fashionable, unique, and high-quality gardening products

With the support of our products, we aim to help people all around the world “Enjoy the Beauty of Gardening” by making it simpler & more fun

Top Sale Products

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

【All you need in one Kit】With so many different things to grow, from vegetables to herbs, planting can require multiple tools to get the job done. With Grenebo Garden Tool Set, cut back on clutter in the garage, this set will meet all of your planting and gardening needs.
【Durable, High Quality】Grenebo gardening tools made from forged stainless steel, can withstand the toughest roots, rocks, and soil. A practical tool of reducing fatigue and helping planting more easily for all gardeners.
【Functional Tools】Hand Trowel: transplanting, filling & composting; Hand Fork: aerating, chopping, sifting, digging & loosing; Hand Weeder: cutting, uprooting, weeding & braking; Garden Shears: trimming & pruning. With them make it easy for us to deal with any difficult problem encountered in garden work.
【Efficient and Practical】Whether you are a first-time gardener or a professional farmer, this basic 8-piece garden tool set will make you feel amazing and practical at the same time. Besides, it will become one of your favorite garden tools, the best gift to families or friends.
【Comfortable Experience】 With wood handles make for an ergonomic and comfortable grip. For the smooth and bright surface, this garden work set will be clean as new again only need to be rinsed with water after use.

Grenebo Garden Tool Set


If the courtyard is the habitat of the body, then garden tools set is the beginning of everything!

Grenebo gardening tools are made with heavy-duty stainless steel, and the wooden ergonomic handles keep you comfortable and reduce fatigue.

Stainless Steel Hand Weeder

Size: 1.18*12.2 Inch

Ideal for removing weeds and roots while protecting surrounding plants well.

Hand 3 Prong Cultivator

Size: 3.3*9.2 Inch

Ideal for digging, scratching, aer-ating and loosening soil when preparing to plant flowers and vegetables

Stainless Steel Hand Trowel

Size: 2.1*8.6 Inch

Ideal for transplanting plants in pots, basins, bedding areas and borders.

Stainless Steel Hand Fork

Size: 3.3* Inch

Ideal for use in borders amd raised beds. It is the efficiency to remove weeds, planting and cultivating.

Previous page
Next page

It comes with a gardening bag has a place to hold each tool securely to always have it within reach.

Previous page

  2. Best Gardening gifts for women

    Grenebo gardening tools also will be an amazingly unique gift for Xmas, birthdays, holidays, anniversaries, new year, and all seasons.

Next page

Whether they can prevent rusting, or would them rust after use for a period of time?

They are made of rustproof stainless steel. After using each time, the resin and sludge deposited on the surface of the hand tool should be cleaned. [Had better not store in a damp place]

Does this gardening tools set come in a box?And can I regard this garden set as a gift?

Yes, it comes in a patterned box, you just need to wrap and decorate it with gift wrapping paper to make a beautiful gardening gift for women friends.

Is this garden kit suitable for beginners?

Sure, our Grenebo gardening tools for women/men contains 9 piece garden hand tool you need to start gardening, It suits all gardeners and hobbyists, even garden gurus, and it’s easy to start your own garden life, and enjoy the beauty of gardening.

Product Description

MAKE PRUNING WORK EASIER: Rust-resistant stainless steel blade are sharp and durable for easy and smooth cut.Anti-slip and ergonomic handle make the gardener clippers more comfortable in your hand.Easy-open spring action reduces hand fatigue while cutting. you can easily to cut without damaging the vital stems and branches of your plants.
User-FRIENDLY SAFETY LOCK:These garden shears have locking mechanisms to keep the sharp blades securely closed when not in use.It is easy to maneuver and can effectively reduce accidental injuries. 
GARDEN GLOVES: This Gardening gloves,made of soft & comfortable cotton fabric,can protect yourself from dirt, skin wounds and nasty splinters when doing yard chores. The grip latex coating provides anti-slip or sure control when grabbing garden & yard tools.
COMFORTABLE HANDLE: The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
PACKING LISTING: The packing include pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter, leaves trimmer, one pair glove, one organizer bag.Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.
